content: In Organisation settings->default streams , It seems that there is a bug, The list of default streams is not scrollable.Peek-2017-09-03-21-57.gif

This seems to be a recently introduced regression to me, caused by the replacement of normal scrollbars with perfectScrollbars. A similar issue is #6215. Search for an existing issue, if there is none then feel free to open open one.
@Harshit Bansal did this end up getting fixed? Seems like something we'll want to resolve...
@Tim Abbott Not yet but an issue was opened. Just now I have updated the issue with few two more places where the same problem exists(User and Bot lists).
I will fix this as soon as I return back to working on zulip on 16th. Meanwhile if some one else finds time to fix it please go ahead. :)
